mapper.select: SELECT frpb.id as id,frpb.name as name,frpb.type as type,frp.first_hour_fee as firstHourFee,frp.other_time_period as otherTimePeriod,frp.other_time_fee as otherTimeFee, frp.max_fee as maxFee,frp.free_use_time as freeUseTime,frp.over_time_fee as overTimeFee,frp.weekday as weekday,frp.start_time startTime,frp.end_time as endTime from t_fee_rule_parking_base frpb left join t_fee_rule_parking frp on frpb.id = frp.fee_rule_parking_base_id and frp.state = 1 where frpb.state = 1 and frpb.id = (select pfrp.fee_rule_id from b_parklot_fee_rule_parking pfrp where pfrp.parklot_id = #{id} and pfrp.state=1) ORDER BY frp.start_time is null ,frp.start_time asc
